keyMoments.description: Luffy destroys the Eternal Pose, making a defining decision for the crew to follow their own path rather than accept help from an enemy.
keyMoments.significance: A pivotal moment that reinforces the crew's philosophy of freedom and self-determination. Shows the crew's trust in Luffy's leadership and their willingness to face danger rather than compromise their values.

keyMoments.description: The crew departs Whisky Peak, fully committed to helping Vivi save Arabasta by taking the dangerous route through the Grand Line.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the crew's deepening bond with Vivi and their commitment to helping her despite the enormous risks posed by Baroque Works and the treacherous Grand Line.

keyMoments.description: Miss All Sunday, the vice president of Baroque Works, makes her first appearance and confronts the Straw Hat crew.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the second-in-command of the organization and demonstrates the reach and power of Baroque Works. Shows that the organization has multiple highly capable agents beyond the numbered pairs.

keyMoments.description: Igaram's ship is destroyed in a massive explosion orchestrated by Miss All Sunday, demonstrating the organization's ruthlessness.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the lethal danger posed by Baroque Works and their willingness to kill to protect their secrets and complete their mission.
